message: Pin versions in pip. Instead of `pip install <package>` use `pip install <package>==<version>` or `pip install --requirement <requirements file>`
Pin versions in apk add. Instead of `apk add <package>` use `apk add <package>=<version>`
This \l will be a regular 'l' in this context.
Use the `--no-cache` switch to avoid the need to use `--update` and remove `/var/cache/apk/*` when done installing packages
Avoid use of cache directory with pip. Use `pip install --no-cache-dir <package>`
Use COPY instead of ADD for files and folders
Pin versions in pip. Instead of `pip install <package>` use `pip install <package>==<version>` or `pip install --requirement <requirements file>`
Avoid use of cache directory with pip. Use `pip install --no-cache-dir <package>`
Ranges can only match single chars (mentioned due to duplicates).
